title: Speech of Shri Mohammad Aaquib, Deputy Commissioner of Champhai on the occasion of 77th Republic Day 2026 at Chhangphut Field, Champhai 26th January 2026
content:
Vawiin Republic Day vawi 77-na ni ropui tak hmang tura lo kal khawm zawng zawng mipuite in zavaiin chibai vek ule. Republic Day hi kan tan ni pawimawh tak a ni a, India ram danpui (constitution) kan hman tan ni a ni a, he danpui pawimawh tak leh hlu tak siamtu, kan ram zalenna sualchhuaktu mi ropui tak tak te zahna chibai min bukpui turin in zavaiin ka sawm che u a ni.

The Indian Constitution is the guiding light for all citizens of India, regardless of gender, religion, caste or place of birth. It embodies the ideals and values that our forefathers envisioned for the unity and integrity of our great nation. As such, I invite each and every one of you to remind ourselves of the spirit of the Constitution and uphold the essential principles it teaches – justice, liberty, equality and fraternity.

The success of the Indian Constitution is reflected in the great advancements of Bharat, as we have made incredible strides in various fields and sectors. Having started out as a post-colonial nation in 1947, we are now one of the biggest economies in the world and have achievements worth noting for any country. Despite the challenges and problems of poverty, inequality, discrimination and underdevelopment, India has risen above and tackled these challenges with intent and purpose, relying on the foundation of constitutional values, and we as a nation have persevered and survived, making the Indian Constitution one of the most enduring constitutions in the world.

Following these successes and triumphs, Champhai District has, in its own way and at its own pace, grown into a place of great importance and value, becoming a crucial centre for tourism and economic activity. I would like to list out some of the achievements of various departments within Champhai District for the people of Champhai, so that you know what great work is being done:

1. The Deputy Commissioner’s Office has continued its commitment to efficient citizen service delivery. In citizen service delivery, a total of 15,053 certificates were issued during 2025–26 covering income, tribal, residential, permanent residential, tax exemption and dependency certificates, while 389 Inner Line Permits (ILPs) were issued during 2025–26.

Also I am pleased to inform that land acquisition is almost completed for the Tualcheng–Pamchung Road, covering a length of 8.040 kilometres, and the Old Hruaikawn–Zokhawthar Road, covering 6.740 kilometres. Award disbursement is currently underway, and the Border Roads Organisation has already commenced work on these important stretches. Land acquisition for the Farkawn–IMB Road and the Thekte–IMB Road, is currently ongoing.

Last year Champhai witnessed 680 landslides and the District Administration responded through timely disaster management measures, including assistance to affected families, compensation for housing, agricultural and livestock losses, repair of public infrastructure such as schools and Anganwadi centres, and search and rescue operations.

In the field of electoral administration, the District Election Office, Champhai demonstrated outstanding performance through effective use of technology in elections, for which Champhai District was conferred the Best Election District Award by the Office of the Chief Electoral Officer, Mizoram, and preparatory work for the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls has been underway since last year.

A major milestone was achieved in the Passion Fruit Processing Project. The District Administration, successfully completed all procedural requirements and finalized the award of the project.

The District Administration, Champhai, implemented several CSR-led initiatives in coordination with various stakeholders. Project LANU focused on adolescent welfare by promoting menstrual health and hygiene among 2,447 girls and distributing bicycles to school-going girls. Foundational English skills were strengthened for more than 406 students, while livelihood support was extended to Ngur Village VO in partnership with the Centre for Cooperative and Livelihood, LBSNAA

2. Champhai District Police have conducted extensive operations from 1stApril 2024 till date, resulting in major seizures and enforcement achievements. 171 persons were arrested under ND&PS Act, 24.656 kg of heroin, 490.896 kg of methamphetamine and 4.740 kg of alprazolam was seized, and a wide range of weapons, ammunitions and explosives were seized. Under MLP Act, large amounts of cases and bottles of various alcohols were seized, such as whiskey, BEDC, local made liquor etc. Multiple trainings have also been conducted by Champhai Police under the New Criminal Laws.

3. Excise and Narcotics Department were equally instrumental in the fight against drugs, arresting 126 persons under ND&PS Act and seizing 119.510 kg of methamphetamine and 14.114 kg of heroin. Under MLP Act, 169 persons were arrested and thousands of litres of alcohol – locally made liqor, BEDC, beer and FML were seized.

4. District Hospital, Champhai had 47,324 OPD cases and admitted 4,907 patients. 370 major operations and 2,819 minor operations were performed, 622 babies were delivered with no maternal deaths and multiple diagnostic services like dialysis sessions, ultrasounds etc. continue to be offered every day. Under Mizoram Health Care Scheme, there were 2,646 inpatients, 2,253 AB-PMJAY beneficiaries and 83 Health Care cases.

5. Under UD&PA Department, Office of DUDO Champhai has been actively maintaining and implementing beautification of four parks, and 55 beneficiaries have successfully uploaded documents for loans under PM SVanidhi. Patient Attendant’s Shelter has been under construction from August 2025. Champhai Solid Waste Management Centre have installed a trammel machine for better waste segregation. 78.55% of funds have been distributed under PMAY-U. Angikaar 2025 campaign was held in September 2025 where documentation for schemes like PMAG, PMSGBY etc. and PM Awas Mela Shehri Helpdesk was opened for PMAY beneficiaries. Pu Liandailova S/O Lalring ‘L’ was selected for the ‘Best House Construction’ award under PMAY (Urban). He received the award assisted by DUDO, Champhai at AR Lammual, Aizawl.

6. Under Rural Development, DRDO Champhai is implementing three Centrally Sponsor Scheme, namely- MGNREGA, PMKSY and PMAY-G. Under MGNREGA, 72 days of employment have been provided to Job Card holders from April, 2025 to November, 2025. Under PMKSY, no. of water related works taken up is 186 and no. of individual assets completed is 174. Under PMAY-G, for FY 2021-2022, 361 houses have been completed and for FY 2023-2024, 226 houses have been completed.

7. PHED Champhai WATSAN Division have completed construction of Farkawn Water Supply Scheme (WSS) and are working on Ruantlang WSS, with 80.51% completion. 233 individual household latrines have been constructed under Swachh Bharat Mission - Grameen. Under AMRUT 2.0, Improvement of Greater Champhai Water Supply Scheme is ongoing with 61.14% completion. They have also finished construction of Water supply to COB Vaikhawtlang and Khawbung Sub Divisional Laboratory Building.

8. Power & Electricity Department collected ₹13.63 crore as revenue till November 2025. Under PM Surya Ghar: Muft Bijli Yojana Scheme, 16 applications have been received. In celebration of SEVA PARV, Awareness Camp & Grievance Redressal Camp was also conducted at Khuanleng and Zokhawthar.

9. Public Works Department, Champhai Division completed construction of flexible pavement, retaining wall, resurfacing of Champhai internal road and formation cutting. Under PMGSY, they are also swiftly working on upgradation & maintenance of Khuangleng-Sesih-Lianpui road and Champhai-Hmunhmeltha-N. Khawbung road.

10. Under Irrigation & Water Resources Department, 3 minor irrigation projects have been executed - Aitamzau MI, Vanapa Thlan Zau MI and Zote Tiau MI. Phaizau Ground Water Irrigation Project is ongoing at Zotlang, sanctions have been accorded for repair and rejuvenation of four MI projects - Buanglui, Lungverh, Thlikva and Thangpui, and Modernization of Command Area Development Works (MCAD) is under preparation for Champhai Sub-valley.

11. Under Land Resources, Soil & Water Conservation Department, construction of two water harvesting tanks and other amenities has been completed at N. Khawbung under RKVY- RAFTAAR. Under NABARD- WDF (watershed development), much work has been done at Tlangsam including installation of gabionic checkdams, construction of bench terraces and other amenities.

12. Office of the District Agriculture Officer, Champhai under NFSM distributed hybrid maize seeds (750 kg), hybrid rice seeds (40 kg) and field pea seeds (250 kg) to farmers. 1,800 soil samples have been collected for Soil Health & Fertility, 10,649 families received instalment of PM-KISAN, pest outbreaks were managed in 8 villages. Under Digital Crop Survey, geo­surveying is ongoing, with 810 plots surveyed. Under National Mission on Edible Oils – Oilseeds, sunflower, rapeseed, mustard seed and niger seeds were distributed and 1,591 farmers have been selected for Nation Mission on Natural Farming.

13. Office of the District Horticulture Officer, Champhai has greatly improved fruit cultivation within the district. Under MIDH, RKVY-PDMC and various-sub schemes, there are beneficiaries of grape cultivation (352), passion fruit (140), mandarin orange (77), papaya (28) and avocado (12), receiving inputs and construction works of various amenities. Vegetable cultivation is also on the rise, with cabbage, tomato, watermelon and other vegetable cultivators receiving seeds, inputs, amenities like sprinklers, manure etc. Under Bana Kaih Scheme, ginger production has reached 10,081.44 quintals and turmeric and Mizo chilli are also being productively cultivated.

14. Office of the District A.H & Vety. Officer, Champhai has received multiple applications for Bana Kaih scheme, with 4 progress partners for Phase – I, 26 for CM Special Package and 7 for Phase – II. Awareness campaigns on animal health were conducted at Bungzung, Khuangthing and Selam. Pig registration as part of caution against ASF is being done every 3 months and compensation for pigs culled due to ASF was regular and comprehensive. Regular vaccination is done throughout the district for Classical Swine Fever (CSF), Foot and Mouth Disease (FMD) and Sheepand Goat Plague (PPR). They had a total of 17,349 OPD cases for various diseases, 5,174 mobile/outcases and 1,529 surgical operations.

15. Office of the District Fisheries Development Officer, Champhai successfully implemented PMMSY with new pond construction, new rearing pond, paddy-cum-fish farming, biofloc tanks etc. for hundreds of beneficiaries. Under Bana Kaih scheme, there were 28 beneficiaries for CM Special Package. Under SDRF, 20 beneficiaries received compensation for fish pond damage. Various training programmes were conducted for beneficiaries such as training for National Fisheries Digital Platform, breeding and seed production of common carp using happa, aquatic weed management in fish pond and awareness programme for PMMSY (collaborated with Cooperation Department).

16. Office of the District Sericulture Officer, Champhai is operating two major projects – Sustainable Livelihood through Ericulture in East Mizoram (Silk Samagra – 2, 2022 -2024) and Augmentation of Muga-culture in Mizoram (Silk Samagra – 2, 2024-2026), which has generated income for 173 families. Under Eri livelihood project, 3 beneficiaries received spinning machines. Through MGNREGA convergence, pits were dug for 10 beneficiaries for muga food plantation. Under Bana Kaih scheme, two progressive farmers were selected under CM Special Package and they each received ₹1 lakh.

17. Champhai Forest Division carries out Nature Learning Centre, with nature tours organized for institutions and organizations. Construction of Satellite Wildlife Rescue Centre at Tlangsam is ongoing. Two medicinal projects, RAMP and MPCDA are being implemented. Afforestation of Denuded Hills in Champhai District, funded by NEC, is ongoing with an aim to afforest 369 ha of forest land. 1643 seedlings have been planted.

18. Under District Project Office, Samagra Shiksha, several civil works such as construction of CWSN toilets, girls toilets, classrooms etc. were undertaken and completed. 8,061 students received free textbooks and 7,854 students received free uniforms as part of RTE entitlements. 26 ICT@School centres are currently functional and thousands of copies of 4 library books were distributed among primary students. Grassroots Sports Development Programme is ongoing with four centres training students after

school hours. Four schools were selected for state level participation under KALA UTSAV – Govt. Khawbung HS, Govt. GM HS, Govt. Ruantlang HS and Holy Angels School. Champhai has three PM SHRI schools at Champhai, Zokhawthar and Farkawn which receive special facilities like music teachers and equipment, and are monitored by three separate persons. PM POSHAN is running smoothly and efficiently, with 100% expenditure in all aspects.

19. Govt. Champhai College recorded commendable academic performance with six University Rank holders in the 2024-2025 examinations and high pass percentages across major courses. The college secured a medal in the Mizoram University Sports Meet 2025. III Semester student, Vanlalchhandama achieved a Gold Medal in the 12thNational Karate Championship held in Kerela. They also published a collaborative book focusing on its adopted village, based on studies conducted from 2019-2023 involving several academic departments. Under PM-USHA, construction of a new academic building is ongoing, along with renovation and upgration of the college field and multipurpose hall.

20. DIET Champhai had major achievements like inauguration of the NIELIT CCC Study Centre, launch of the Diet Champhai Management System and inauguration of Diet Champhai Girls’ Hostel. They conducted various training programmes and workshops like Pedagogy for Hindi teachers, headmasters’ training for primary and middle school, PARAKH Rashtriya Sarvekshan (PRS) etc. They conducted environmental awareness campaign, and were part of blood donation camp for the occasion of 5thanniversary of NMBA.

21. Office of the District Child Protection Officer, Champhai is actively involved in handling cases related to struggling children. CWC disposed of 78 cases and 44 children were admitted to homes. 23 cases under JJB were also disposed in relation to children in conflict with law. Awareness campaigns for POCSO, JJ Act, cyber security, child marriage were conducted. World Day for Prevention of Child Abuse was observed and a programme called “New Generation Movement” was conducted. National Children’s Day, Universal Children’s Day and International Adoption Month were successfully observed.

22. Under ICDS Project, Office of the Child Development Project Officer was able to help the recovery of 9 children identified as Severe Acute Malnutrition cases. 3 new Anganwadi centres were constructed and repair and renovation of AWCs is constantly ongoing. Through MLA funding, Kahrawt AWC-II received construction of upper floor. 30 AWCs were upgraded to Saksham AWCs with improved facilities and amenities.

23. District Social Welfare Office, Champhai conducted n extensive PM- DAJGUA Awareness and Bebefit Saturation Camp across 8 villages to raise awareness on government scheme benefits. Verification of NSAP beneficiaries was carried out in multiple villages to update and correct beneficiary records. The digitization of NSAP processes was sucessfully completed. The office observed International Day against Drug Abuse with a walkathon. The office supported ALIMCO officials during their assessment camps in Leithum and Zotlang by providing necessary data and assistance. On World Disabled Day, the DSWO, in collaboration with Samagra Shiksha Abhiyan conducted welfare activities and distributed blankets to 115 specially-abled students. Unemployment allowance was also provided to three eligible educated unemployed persons with disabilities.

24. Office of the District Information & Public Relations Officer is actively working to disseminate activities of various offices and institutions, releasing 170 press releases with accompanying photos and news clips for print, TV, radio news and other media outlets. They are also engaged in social media through uploading of reels, posters, notices, office orders and other important information for the attention of the public, documenting activities and events like NMBA, Har Ghar Tiranga, National Sports Day etc. They accompanied multiple VIPs such as Ministers and MLAs to various places within Champhai District and publicized their activities and interactions, ensuring proper outreach to the people of Champhai and Mizoram.

25. Office of the District Cooperative Officer, Champhai registered 15 new cooperative societies with 9 being M-PACS. 202 societies were successfully audited and computerization of PACS is ongoing with 7 done so far, transforming them into e-PACS. Updation of societies on the National Cooperative Database is regular. 11 societies completed PMKSK training, 3

societies have been approved for non-bulk storage of petroleum and 7 societies availed loans under NMDFC.

26. Office of the Superintendent, District Jail, Champhai is currently undergoing reconstruction of Champhai Prison under SASCI, and construction of female ward, staff quarter and main wall is ongoing.

27. District Transport Office, Champhai collected a total revenue of ₹1.44 crore from road tax, MV tax, passenger tax and goods tax, and is one of the highest revenue earning offices in the district. ₹36.18 lakhs was collected as compounding fines. 1,521 driving licenses were issued, 543 two wheeler and 212 four wheeler vehicles were newly registered and parking fee collection amounted to ₹3.59 lakhs.

28. Office of the District Local Administration Officer, Champhai distributed 1stand 2ndinstalments of untied grants and 2ndinstalment of tied grants under 15thFinance Commission to 62 village councils. Under RGSA, 9 village councils received ₹20 lakhs each for construction of Panchayat Bhavan.

29. Land Revenue and Settlement Office, Champhai expects to cover 5,545 beneficiary households across 31 villages to be given government recognized land titles using drone survey unde SVAMITVA scheme. Under Digital India Land Records Modernization Programme, 29,325 RoRs were digitized, all guard files and connected documents were scanned and GIS updation has been very successful. For FY 2025-26, land tax collected has so far amounted to ₹51.80 lakhs, and online tax payment has also been introduced. 511 residential LSCs, 222 house passes, 19 periodic pattas and 8 land leases were issued.

30. Legal Metrology Office, Champhai conducted 582 inspections across various commercial and market centres and 34 violation cases were filed under Legal Metrology Act, 2009. 10,851 weighing and measuring instruments were verified. Extensive inspections were carried out under Legal Metrology (Packaged Commodities) Rules, 2011, such as LPG trucks, cylinders, POL tankers and under these, 18 cases were registered. 7 consumer awareness programmes were conducted covering 4 schools and

community halls. 5 licenses were issued for manufacturer, packer and dealer. A total of ₹1.35 lakh was collected from various activities.

31. BDO Champhai, Champhai RD Block generated 74 days of employment for 13,989 households under MGNREGA, under which 761 works have been completed out of 1,143. These include construction of piggery shelters, poultry sheds; construction of new water reservoirs, and fish pond development. Block Mission Management Unit, MzSRLM – Champhai RD Block covers 17 villages and 2,770 SHG members. Convergence with MGNREGA produced livelihood and infrastructure activities on pig sty, land levelling, terrace, farm pond and mini percolation tank. Convergence with Agriculture and Horticulture Departments produced distribution of saplings to 3 VOs, benefitting 99 households.

32. Office of the District Civil Supply Officer, Champhai distributed 121 iris scanners to all retailers in Champhai. They are also preparing to distribute new Epos machines and Digital Weighing Scales. The office distributed 3 months quota to all beneficiaries under NFSM for monsoon season, and rations under NFSA, non-NFSA, PM POSHAN etc were regular throughout the year. World Consumer Day was successfully observed and Consumer Awareness Workshop was conducted in June 2025, focussing on sensitizing Online Service Delivery Managers and Consumers. POL monitoring and regulation is smooth, and supply was effectively regulated during shortages. LPG inspection is also regular, with checks for compliance with standard weight and ensuring home delivery.

33. The Taxation Department of Champhai Zone has shown outstanding performance as it surpassed its revenue target of ₹9.65 crores by October 2025, achieving 110% of the target for the current financial year. From 1stApril to 31stOctober 2025, the Department recorded the following collections: GST Collection - ₹5.48 crores, VAT Collection - ₹3.58 crores, Road Maintenance Cess - ₹63.36 lakhs, Social & Infrastructure Cess - ₹63.36 lakhs and the total Tax Collection is ₹10,65,82,585

Seeing and hearing these achievements brings me great joy and jubilation, knowing that each and every office within Champhai District is fully dedicated and engaged with the development and advancement of the people of Champhai in every aspect. I thank all departments for their priceless efforts for the district, and I hope that these efforts bear fruit for all of Champhai and beyond.

Lastly, I would like to remind everyone that even though Republic Day is celebrated once a year, the Indian Constitution lives every day, every month, every year. Let us embrace our Constitution and its ideals with great national pride and passion, let us live in unity and fraternity, treating each other with equality, kindness and respect and let us all rise together and strive to make a better Champhai, a better Mizoram, a better India.

Ka lawm e. Jai Hind.

Dated Khawzawl, the 26th January, 2026 :Vawiin chawhma khan India Republic Day vawi 77-na chu Mualvawm Field, Khawzawlah ropui taka lawm a ni a. Khawzawl bawrhsap Pu K. Vanlalthiana chuan he hun hi khuallian niin a hmanpui.

title: REPUBLIC DAY, 2026 KOLASIB BAWRHSAP PU ROBERT C. LALHMANGAIHA THUSAWI
content:
Vawiin, India Republic day vawi-77 na lawm tura lo kalkhawm zawng zawngte leh  vawiina Parade hmuhnawm tak min entirtu Armed leh Unarmed Contingents te, NCC, Scouts & Guides te leh school naupang duhawm tak tak te - Republic Day chibai ka buk a che u. Vawiin hi India ramin mahni puala Danpui (Constitution) kan neihna ni leh, mipui rorelna ram (Republic) kan nihna nemnghettu a nih avangin kan tan ni chhinchhiah tlak leh pawimawh tak a ni tih i hre thar leh \heuh ang u.

Kolasib District hi Mizoram luhka kan nih ang takin district  pawimawh leh langsar tak kan ni a. He kan District pawimawhna hria a sawrkar Department hrang hrangte \hahnemngaihna leh  thawhhona \ha tak awm hi District Bawrhsap ka nihna angin chhuanawm ka ti takzet a ni. Heng kan hnathawh te, hmasawnna hna kal lai te leh hmachhawp hrang hrang kan neih te hi tluang taka kan kalpui zel theih nan department hrang hrangte tun aia nasa a inlungrual leh chak taka thawk ho zel turin ka sawm a che u.

A tawp berah chuan, vawiina sawrkar hnathawk kalkhawmte hian sawrkara mawhphurhna chelhtu kan nihna hi eizawnna mai ni lovin, 'Mipui Rawngbawl' (Public Service) a ni tih i vawng nawn leh ang u. Mipui tana thawk kan ni a, an ham\hatna leh himna hi kan ngaih pawimawh ber tur a ni. Amaherawhchu, hmasawnna tluantling neih nan chuan sawrkar hmalakna chauh a tawk lova; khawtlang hruaitute, tlawmngai pawl hrang hrangte leh mipuite thlawpna leh thawhpuina hi a pawimawh takzet a ni. Sawrkar leh mipuite inkarah inrintawnna  leh thawhhona \ha a awm a, pheikhai inveng tawna hmasawnna kawnga ke kan pen rual chuan kan district hian hma a sawn lehzual dawn a ni tih kan hriat a pawimawh takzet a ni.

ACHIEVEMENTS OF VARIOUS GOVERNMENT OFFICES IN KOLASIB

DC OFFICE :

Kolasib District a Administration khaipa ber DC Office hi Administration mai piah lamah District chhunga Office hrang hrangte hnathawh dan enpuitu leh Department hrang hrangte’n thawhhona \ha tak an neih theihna tura khaikhawmtu pawimawh tak a nih angin kawng hrang hrangin hna a thawk thin a. DC Office in a kum kalta atanga vawiin ni thlenga a hnathawh \henkhatte lo ngaithla ho ila:

1. Bana Kaih (Hand Holding Policy):

Kolasib District hnuaiah hian Department pasarih (7) (Agriculture, Horticulture, AH&Vety, LESDE, LRS&WC, S&YS leh Tourism) a\angin Partners 65 (sawmruk panga) thlan chhuah an ni a, Training leh Certifcate te pek an ni.

2. Land Acquisition:

Kolasib District-ah hian CALA (Competent Authority for Land Acquisition) enkawlna hnuaiah 4-lane kawng laihna tur Vairengte a\anga Sairang inkalpawhna a buaipui a, heng te hi Package hrang hrang pariat a \hen a ni.

Reporting period chhung hian Package-8 chhungah cheng Rs, 24,08,75,806.23/- beneficiary 16 hnenah sem a ni a. Package 2 ah hian cheng 18,10,65,340/- beneficiary 36 te hnenah pekchhuah a ni tawh bawk.

Court case/Arbitration case engemaw zat awmin, CALA court kal tlangin rambuai chinfel hna nasa taka buaipui a ni.

Package 3-8 chhunga contractor te chuan kawnglaih hna hmun engemawzatah an \an tawh a ni.

3. DM&R:State Disaster Reponse Fund (SDRF) a\angin kum 2025 leh 2026 chhungin chhungkua 102 (Za leh pahnih) hnenah zangna dawmna, Cheng 21,51,850 (Nuai sawmhnih pakhat cheng singnga sang khat leh zariat leh sawmnga) pek chhuah a ni.

5. RTI:2025-2026 chhunga Right to Information (RTI) Application lo lut zawng zawng te information pek vek an ni a, Pending application a awm  lo.

Heng a chunga kan tarlan te bakah hian certificate chi hrang hrang Income, Residential, Tribal leh Permanent certificate 12,911 lai pekchhuah a ni a, Birth Certificate, Death Certificate leh Rural Certificate \hahnem tak pekchhuah a ni bawk.

SECURITY : (SP, EXCISE, JAIL & TRANSPORT)

Superintendent of Police, Kolasib:

Sawrkar chuan mipui himna leh ralmuanna a ngai pawimawh hle a. Kolasib District pawh Kolasib SP kaihruaina hnuaiah kan Police-te an rim in hna an thawk \ha hle a. Office of The Superintendent of Police, Kolasib chuan nikum August thla a\anga vawiin thleng in cheng nuaih 3.69 chuang  zet pawisa leh thil bo dangte an hmu kir thei a. Dan lova Kuhva tawlhruk pawh Bag 312, cheng nuaih 35 chuang hu (Rs.35,60,000) chuang hu an man bawk a ni.

Ausgust 2024 a\anga Kumin January (report pek hun thleng hian) Zu(IMFL&Beer) cheng Rs.13,67,480/- man hu leh Heroin, gram 83.55; cheng Rs.16,71,000 man hu zet an man a. Heng bakah hian mipuiah zirtirna kalpuiin - POCSO, Cyber Crime, Drugs Abuse and Illicit Trafficking Awareness Campaign-te vawi 17 lai an nei tawh a ni. Hemi piahlamah hian Kolasib Police te hian  Krismas leh Kumthar hun ralmuang taka kan hman theih nan ngawrh takin an duty bawk a ni.

Excise & Narcotics Department:

Ruihtheihthil hi kan ram leh hnam hmelma a ni a, Sawrkar pawhin ngai pawimawhin a do rem kawngah tan nasa takin a la a. Excise & Narcotics Department, Kolasib District Enforcement Staff-te hmalakna in MLP Act 2019 hnuaiah Case 3257 chuang ziahluh niin kumin chhungin Rakzu litre 4536 chuang an man tawh bakah Zu chi hrang hrang Bottle leh Can 33903 chuang an man a. Ruihhlo leh damdawi chi dang Kg 28.165 an  man bawk a ni. Kumin chhungin cheng nuai 37 chuang (3,781,477)Sawrkar Revenue-ah an chhung lut tawh bawk.

Tun dinhmunah Superintendent of Jail, Kolasib hmalakna in District Jail Saidan-ah Convict 85 \ha taka enkawl mek an ni a. SASCI sum hmangin Kolasib District Jail hi sak \hat mek a ni a; Jail Ward pahnih, Go-down, Kitchen, MRHG Barrack, Staff quarters pahnih, Public Visitor Toilet leh Jail Fencing hna thawh mek a ni. Jail sakthat hna hi Dt.27.5.2025 atanga  \an a ni a, kumin kum laihawl  a sak zawh tum a ni.

District Transport Office Kolasib:

District Transport Office Kolasib chuan kum kalta a\anga June, 2025 thleng  khan cheng Maktaduai 100 chuang (Rs.101,079,187)  sawrkarah chhiah a chhung lut a, lirthei ziah luh thar 2,280 awmin, License pekchhuah 724 a nei bawk a ni.

MEDICAL : (CMO, DMS, NURSING SCHOOL)

Kan District-a Damdawiin pui ber nghaktu leh mipui hriselna kawnga chhum lo chat lova thawk \hin Chief Medical Officer (CMO) leh District Medical Superintendent (DMS) Office-a thawktute hnathawh \henkhatte i han tarlang ila.

Kum 2025 chhung  hian Mizoram Universal  health care scheme (MUHCS) hnuaiah mi 909 enrolled tawh ani a,PMJAY card (Ayushman card) issue zat hi 1381(February 2025-December 2026) a ni . Kan district chhung a nu naupai zawng zawng te TD(sakawrekhrik danna) pek hi 100% niin naupang kumkhat hnuai lam hridanna pek kim zat hi 93.5 % a ni.

Tin kum 2025-26 chhung hian District chhung PHC zawng zawng leh DH hi Ram chhung Damdawiin \ha bik tehna, National Quality Assurance Standard (NQAS) ah National Certified vek niin, CHC leh HWC-SC pali  te State Certification an hmu tawh bawk a ni .

Damlo enkawlna khum 100 awmna tur District Hospital Building thar chu 87% sak zawh fel tawh niin, Building Block A hi zawh fel tawh a ni a, Male ward leh Nursing Superintendent Office te Block A leh B ah hian sawn phei an ni a, block C hi sak mek a ni bawk.

School of Nursing, Thingdawl:

School of Nursing, Thingdawl pawhin a din tirh a\angin Nursing zirlai hlawhtling tak tak an chherchhuak reng \hin a. Academic Session hnuhnung berah khan Mizoram Nursing Council Board Examination hnuaiah Top-10 ah engemaw zat langin an Pass vek bawk a ni. He Nursing School ah hian batch 6 chhuak tawh in tunah zirlai 62 an awm mek a , tunah hian College of Nursing ni turin upgradation approval, Ministry of Health and Family Welfare Govt of India ah neih tawh niin, inbuatsaihna a kal mek zel a ni.

AGRICULTURE : (AGRICULTURE, HORTICULTURE, AH&VETY, FISHERIES, SERICULTURE, IRRIGATION, FOREST, SOIL, KVK & ICAR)

Sawrkar ngaihpawimawh ber chu ei leh bara intodelh hi a ni a. Chumi atan chuan Sawrkar Flagship Program - Bana Kaih (Handholding) Scheme hnuaia thlai thlan bik Sawhthing lei leh hralh buaipui tur hian District Agricultural Marketing Committtee (DAMC) din a ni a. DAMC, Kolasib hmalakna kaltlang hian June ni 30, 2025 thlenga Sawhthing leikhawm zat hi Quintals sangthum zariat sawmriat pahnih (3,882.694) a ni a, hei hi cheng vaibelchhe hnih dawn (Rs 1,94,13,470/-) man a ni a. Sawhthing hi lei chhunzawm tura ruahman a ni bawk.

Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Department:

Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Department hnuaiah Oil Palm rah hralha eizawng chhungkaw 250 an awm mek a, nikum April atanga January, 2026 thlenga Oil Palm rah an hralh zat chu metric tonne 2362 a ni a, hei hi Nuai 354 man hu a ni. Tin, nikum chhung khan Oil Palm tiak 55,627 chuang semchhuah a ni bawk.

PM-KISAN hnuaiah loneitu ham\hatna dawng thei chhungkaw 12,943 Register fel tawh a ni. Digital Agriculture Mission hnuaiah hian Kolasib District chhunga leilet leh tlangram Terrace neite chu Landmark App hmangin an ram Geo-Referencing/Land Mark (ram chhinchiah) sak an ni a, he land geo-referencing Data hi Digital Crop Survey atana la hman tur a ni.

Horticulture Department

Kumin chhungin Horticulture Department hmalakna in Bairabi, Thingdawl leh Kolasib-ah Avocado hmun 45 ah chin thar a ni a. Thingfanghma tiak 3,000 leh Mizo Hmarhcha loneitute hnenah semchhuah anih bakah thlai enkawlna hmanrua Sprayer leh Pipe Subsidy a pek chhuah niin thlai chi \ha Hybrid Variety leh Local thlai chite semchhuah a ni a. Chhungkaw-40 te hnenah Mizo hmarhchate chin tir a ni bawk.

Animal Husbandry & Veterinary (AH&Very) Department hnuaiah hian Kolasib District-ah ran damlo entirna Dispensary-7 leh Rural Animal Health Centre-3 leh Surveillance Check Post-3 a awm. Hengah hian nitin ran damlo enkawl leh ram chhunga ran lakluhte enfiah \hin a ni. Ran hri venna (Vaccine) a pek chhuah \hin a ni bawk. State pawn a\anga ran hri a lo luh loh nan Inter-state Animal Check Post – Vairengte, Bairabi leh Saphaiah te endikna kalpui a ni a; 1stAugust 2025 - 31stDecember 2025 chhunga ran lo lut zat leh endik zat chu - 394097 a ni.

Ran chi \ha tih pun kawngah AH& Vety Department hian hma la in, PM Kisan hnuaiah KCC Loan hmangin ranvulhtute an buaipui bawk. Fisheries Department Kolasib hmalakna PMMSY hnathawh a ni a, tuikhuah/dil thar leh Sangha note khawina tur laih \anpuina Kuthnathawktu mi 265 te hnenah pek a ni a, hei hi a vaiin Hactare 30 vel  a zau a ni a. Sangha chi nuai 12 chuang Kuthnathawktute hnenah Subsidy Rate a semchhuah a ni a. Cage Culture pawh kalpuiin Tuirial Hydel Project-ah Cage 90 dah fel tawh a ni.

Sericulture Department hnuaiah Kolasib District hian Pangang chi siam chhuahna hmun li ah a nei a, chungte chu Govt. Mulberry Seed Farm, Vairengte, Govt. Eri Seed Farm, Project Veng, Govt. Muga Seed Farm, Saidan leh Kawnpuite an ni. Heng Farm a\ang hian Pangang khawitute hnenah an semchhuak \hin a ni. 1. Eri Cocoon: 272.44 kg

2. Muga Cocoon: 21443 nos.

Cocoon hi Sericulture Department hian a khawitute a\angin engtiklai pawhin a lei sak reng thei bawk a ni.

Subsidized Rate in Solar Water Pump 1st phase chu loneitu mi 23 te hnenah pekchhuah tawh niin, 2nd phase atan dilna hi lakkhawm leh mek a ni.

Kolasib Forest Division hmalakna in Kolasib District-ah ramngaw leh nungchate humhalh hna thawh \hin a ni a. Land Resources, Soil & Water Conservation Department chuan ram leilung leh tuihnate humhalh turin hna an thawk \hin a, Chief Minister Rubber Mission hnuaiah Hortoki, Bilkhawthlir, Saiphai leh N. Ran, leilung leh thai lam zir bingna thawktu  KVK leh ICAR te chuan loneih leh ran vulh kawnga hmasawnna atan hna pawimawh tak an thawk \hin a.

Kum liam ta khan a vawikhatna atan Nihawi (Sunflower) Variety 2 chu hlawhtling takin Chemphai leh Buhchangphaiah enchhinna neih a lo ni tawh a, hei hi tel/hriak tharchhuah lama Kolasib kan intodelh theih nan a ruahmanna a ni. Heng bakah hian buh variety \ha chi te, sweet patato te leh Alu chi \ha chi ah te hmalak a ni bawk. KVK Kolasib hian Loneitu 3241 te hnenah Training vawi 89 kum liam ta chhung khan a pek bakah thlai chi hrang hrang Loneitute hnenah a semchhuak \hin a ni. KVK Kolasib Senior Scientist and Head Dr. Michelle C. Lallawmkimi leh Dr. Carolyn Zothansiami te chuan Scientist of the Year 2025 leh Young Scientist of the year 2025  Award an dawng bawk.

ICAR:

Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR) Kolasib chuan kum liam ta chhung khan sik leh sa mila thlai leh ran te enkawl dan chungchangah zirchianna hlawhtling takin an lo nei tawh a. Tribal Sub Plan hnuaiah Training hlawk thlak tak tak mipuite-ah pein, Loneitute hmasawnna kawngah Project hrang hrang a chhawpchhuak thin a. Leilet buh  thar hnem chi ‘RC-M-16’ (hektar khata kg 6146 thar thei) te zir chiang in  acidic soil tana phosphorus mamawh tawk bithliah te a siam bawk a. Rannung, thlai ei chhe thin te do nan rannung do na hlo tha tak tak hman tur loneitute an hrilhhriat thin .He centre ah hian kum kalta chhung khan training vawi 11 leh, hriselna leh inzirtirna camp (awareness and health camps) vawi 9 a buatsaih a ni.

title: REPUBLIC DAY 2026, SAITUAL BAWRHSAP DR. LALNGURA TLAU THUSAWI
content:
Vawiin ni ropui tak, India Republic Day vawi 77-naah hian Saitual District mipui zawng zawngte duhsakna chibai ka buk a che u.

India khua leh tui te zawng zawng te tana ni chhinchhiah tlak tak, January ni 26, 1950 atang khan India Danpui (Constitution) chu a taka hman tan a lo ni ta a, he Danpui kan hman aṭangin India ram chu mipui thlante rorelna (democracy) ram lian ber kan lo ni thei ta a ni. He Danpui hian India ram khua leh tui zawng zawng te tan dikna, zalenna, intluktlanna leh inunauna min pek bakah ei leh bar intodelhna leh mipa leh hmeichhe intluktlanna thlengin kawng min hawnsak a ni.

Chuvangin, vawiinah hian kan ram tana sulsutu hmasate, zalenna min thlen a, Danpui tha tak min siam sak tute hre rengin, zahna chibai i buk theuh ang u.

Vawiinah hian kum kalta chhunga Saitual District-a Sawrkar hmalakna thenkhat te han tarlang ila:-

Mizoram Police-in ṭum khata Heroin a man tam ber ni turin Saitual DEF chuan heroin kg 15, cheng vaibelchhe 4 leh nuaih 50 (₹4.5 crore) man hu an man a, dan leh thupek kengkawhtu kan District Police te inpekna a chhuanawm ka ti hle a ni. Saitual DEF chuan awareness campaigns/programme hi school, biak in leh community hall-ah te heng ‘Traffic rules’, ‘Career counselling’, ‘Cyber crimes/awareness’, ‘POCSO Act’, ‘Three new criminal Laws’ leh ‘Drug abuse’ tih thupui hmang tein vawi engemaw zat an nei tawh bawk a ni.

Kan ram thalaite ruihhloin min run mek zel a, Excise & Narcotics Department chuan zu leh ruihhlo thahnemngai takin a do thin a. Kum 2025 chhung khan kan district chhunga khua awm zawng zawng (khaw 41) te pawh duty-in an tlawh chhuah vek a, Saitual District chhungah Drug free village (ruihhlo zuar leh ti awm lohna hmun) sawmparuk (16) lai mai a awm hi a lawmawm hle a ni. Excise & Narcotics Department te hi MHIP leh Sub. Hqrs. YMA Saitual District te nena tanghovin Counselling Board an din a, dan bawhchhia mante hi counselling an neihpui thin bakah Camping Centre hrang hrangah te leh Sawrkar Programme ‘Hulhliap Short Stay’ Sihphirah te an dah thin a ni. Kum 2025 chhung hian Excise & Narcotics Station, Saitualah hian case 212 ziah luh a ni a, ruihhlo leh zu thahnem tak leh dan bawhchhia mi engemaw zat man a ni bawk.

School Education Department leh Samagra Shiksha Saitual District hnuaiah zirnain hma a sawn theihna turin theih tawpa hma lak a ni a, Mizoram aiawhin Govt. Saitual High School Pipe Band te chu India Eastern Zonal Level Band Competition 2025-2026 ah Girl Band Category leh Boy Band Category ah 3-na ve ve an ni. Hei bakah hian State Level Children Science Congress leh intihsiakna hrang hrangah Saitual District zirlai naupangte chu an thleng sang thin hle a, zirtirtute inpekna hi a fakawm ka tiin, District tihmingthatu naupangte chher chhuak zel tura theih tawp chhuah chhunzawm turin ka sawm duh che u a ni.

Health and Family Welfare department hnuaiah District Hospital, Saitual chuan Mizoram District Hospital fai leh thianghlim inelna Kayakalp 2024-25 ah pakhatna lawmman a dawng a, Eco-friendly facility-ah lawmman pahnihna a dawng bawk a ni. District Hospital Saituala thawktute ka lawmpuiin, an chhuanawm ka ti khawp mai. Phuaibuang, Phullen leh Suangpuilawn Primary health Centre ten National Quality Assurance Standard Certification an hmu a, India rama sawrkar damdawi in tha tehna hrang hrangah an tling a ni. Mimbung Primary Health Centre pawhin State certification hmuin, National hmachhawn mai turin an inbuatsaih mek a ni. Saitual District pawhin damdawi in ngeia nau neih inzirtirna kawngah pawh hma kan sawn zel a, tun dinhmunah hian 99.43% in damdawi in ngeiah nau an nei tawh a, 100% ni ngei turin tan lak mek zel a ni.

Ei leh bara mipui an intodelh theih nan Horticulture Department hnuaiah thlai chi thahnem tak sem a ni a, thlai leh thei chi hrang hrang- tomato, zikhlum, dawnfawh, dragon fruit leh Mizo hmarcha te chu khaw hrang hrangah chin a ni bawk. Thlai chingtute tana tui dah khawlna tur Pre- Fabricated Geo-lined Water Tank (unit 75) leh tui pekna tur Drip & Sprinkler Irrigation System System (Unit 56) te chu khaw hrang hrangah siam a ni a. Heng bakah hian Pack House, Greenhouse leh Warehouse cum Collection Centre te chu khaw hrang hrangah din a ni bawk.

Kut hnathawktute hmasawnna atana hna thawk thin Agriculture Department hnuaiah mi sawm (10) chuan Mizoram Bana Kaih (Handholding) scheme hnuaiah CM Special package atang tanpuina an dawng a, mi pathum te chu sawrkar thawhpui progress partner atan thlan an ni bawk. Kuthnathawktute tan sawrkar scheme atangin khaw hrang hrangah Integrated Farming System (IFS), Culvert (1 Unit), Community Water Harvesting Structure (WHS), Nusery pahnih leh water tank sawm panga(15) te sak a ni. Kuthnathawktute tan knapsack sprayers 164 leh High Yielding Variety (HYV) seed 40 sem a ni bawk.

District Rural Development Office (DRDO)hnuaiah Job Card holder 12,430te tan January 2026 thleng khan inhlawhna ni 87 chhung siam sak an ni. PMAY-G hnuaiah beneficiaries 192 te chu insak tanpuina pek an ni a, PMKSY WDC 2.0 hnuaiah balhla, limbu leh hmarcha te chin niin, a enkawlna tur terrace leh tui dahkhawlna te siam a ni bawk.

District Sericulture Office, Saitual hnuaiah hamthatna dawngtu Muga and Eri farmer 170 an awm a. Kum 2024-2025 chhung khan Saitual District-ah Eri cocoons kg 243 leh Muga commercial Cocoons a 30,82 9 leh a chi 5644 thar chhuah a ni.

Nikum March ni 21 khan Saitual District-ah a vawi khatna atan District Fisheries Department hmalaknain Sangha Kutpui (Fish Festival) Tamdil-ah neih a ni a, he sangha kutpui hi mipuiin an hlutin, chhimtu pawh an thahnem hle a, a hlawhtling hle a ni. Kum 2025 chhungin PMMSY Scheme hnuaiah dil laih tanpuina chu mi 305 hnenah pek chhuah a ni a, khuarel chhiatna avanga dil chhia mi 71 hnenah tanpuina pek a ni bawk. CM Special package hnuaiah progress partner mi 16 hnenah pawisa sem chhuah tawh a ni.

DCSO, Saitual District hnuaia Supply Godown tinah Digital Weighing Scale dah vek a ni a. Fair Price Shop tinah Digital Weighing Scale thar leh Iris Scanner hmantir vek an ni bawk. Vawiin thlengin Ration buhfai a hun takah sem theih zel a ni a, LPG Home Delivery pawh harsatna awm lova kalpui zel a ni.

Inkalpawhna kawngtha nei tura hmalatu PWD, Saitual Division chuan kum kalta chhung khan formation cutting (1km), Black top (Flexible Pavement) (5.639 km), Culverts (CD Works) (4 no.s) leh Protection works (370 km) te an khawih a ni.

Tui thianghlim leh hnianghnar mitinin kan neih theih nana hma latu PHED Saitual District chuan nasa takin hma a la a, Jal Jeevan Mission hnuaiah in 9433-ten anmahni in ngeiah tui herh haw thei tawhin, khaw 8-ah Solar Pumping hmang a tui pump chhuah a ni a, khaw tin Har Ghal Jal an ni tawh a ni. Saitual District a thingtlang khaw 36-ah Open Defecation Free Plus (ODF+) Model Village vek tawh niin, heng khaw tinah hian 15th Finance Commission nen a Convergence-in Community Soak Pit, Composed Pit, IHHL leh Community Sanitary Complex te sak a ni.

Saitual District Transport Office (DTO) chu nikum October thla khan Transport Minister-in a hawng a, tun thlengin hna tha tak thawkin motor 77 an register tawh a, driving license hi 542 pek chhuah tawh niin, fine engemaw zat a lut tawh bawk a ni.

AH & Vety Department chuan ran vulhtute tan hmasawnna leh hamthatna tam tak a chhawp chhuah sak a. Kum 2025 chhung hian ran damlo engemaw zat enkawl niin, ran hri danna (Vaccine) hmangin rante chiu thin an ni bawk. Ran enkawltute training neihpui niin, khaw hrang hrangah a thlawna ran inentirna “Animal Health Camp” neih a ni. African Swine Fever laka inven nan ran enkawltute hnenah awareness campaign tha tak neih a ni bawk.

Deputy Commissioner of State Tax, Saitual Zone chuan nikum April thla atanga tun thlengin GST cheng ₹ 6,02,09,421/- an khawn a, Profession Tax cheng ₹ 39,66,457/- hmuin, VAT cheng ₹ 70,12,568/-an khawn khawm bawk a ni. Chhiah zawng zawng tling khawm hi cheng ₹ 7,11,88,446  (Vaibelchhe pasarih nuaih sawmpakhat leh sing riat sang riat zali sawmli paruk) a ni.

UD&PA department hmalaknain AMRUT 2.0 scheme hnuaiah Saitual Town chhungah Water Body Rejuvenation Project 6 (Paruk) hnathawh tur a chhuak a, thawh zawh vek tawh niin, State Priority Project 2024-25 hnuaiah hian Saitual, Ngopa leh Phullenah te hna hrang hrang (PCC Flooring, Retaining Wall, Steps, etc.) 16 (Sawmparuk) thawh tur chhuak te chu thawh zawh vek a ni. Saitual Town hi pawn/khawlaia inthiar awm lohna Open Defecation Free-ah puan lo ni tawhin, Open Defecation Free Plus (ODF+) certify hial a ni tawh bawk.

Mission Shakti hi hmeichhiate himna, humhimna leh chawikanna atana Central Sawrkar in scheme a kalpui niin Women & Child Development in a enkawl a ni a. Saitual District chhungah Mission Shakti hnuaia Office hrang hrang a awm a, chungte chu District Hub for Empowerment of Women (DHEW), One Stop Centre (OSC) leh Sakhi Niwas te an ni.

District Hub for Empowerment of Women (DHEW) hi sawrkar kaihhruai hmalakna a ni a, India ram pum, state leh district level-a hmeichhiate chawikanna lama hma la tute an ni. DHEW Saitual hi PMMVY Enrolment Drive August 2025-a neihah khan India rama District zawng zawngah 5-na an ni pha a ni.

One Stop Centre (OSC) hi hmeichhia, harsatna tawkte tanpuina leh humhimna petu an ni a. One Stop Centre, Saitual hi Mission Shakti Mizoram Annual Review Meet, April 2025-a neihah khan Mizorama One Stop Centre awm zawng zawng 12 zinga Best Performance Award hlan an ni bawk. Kum 2025 January atanga December thlengin OSC-ah hian case 99 ziah luh a ni a tawh.

Sakhi Niwas (Women Working Hostel) hi Mizoram-ah District 11- ah District 5 chauh nei zingah chuan kan tel a ni. Saitual District hnuaiah hian Anganwadi Centre 130 awmin, heng zinga Anganwadi Centre 120 te hi Saksham Anganwadi a upgrade vek an ni. Anganwadi Centre  building, choka leh zun in te a tul ang ang thawm that a ni tawh bawk a ni.

Information & Public Relations Department chuan Saitual District-ah nikum chhung khan Press Release engemaw zat an tichhuak tawh a, Saitual District chhunga sawrkar hmalakna leh hmachhawp puanzar kawngah hna tangkai tak an thawk mek a ni.

Deputy Commissioner office chuan District hmasawnna atana department hrang hrang hna thawhte khai khawmin, mipui mamawh hrang hrang ngaihtuah leh pek chhuah hna a thawk thin a. Hmasawnna hna kalpui nana ram lak chungchang te, zin mite leh ram dang atanga lo kal tan ILP pek chhuah te, dan anga silai leh a mu leh puak thei thil kawl leh hman phalna pek chhuah te, khua leh tuite tana certificate pawimawh pek chhuah te buaipuiin, chhiat rupna leh rikrum thil a thlen changin a tul angin hma a la vat thin a. District hmasawn nan DC Office chu Department, pawl, kohhran leh khawtlang hruaitute nen thawhhona tha kan nei thin chu lawmawm ka ti a, kawng hrang hrangah thawhhona tha tak kan neih zel theih ka beisei.

Awle, vawiin Republic Day hlawhtling taka hman a nih theih nana tha leh zung senga mawhphurhna hrang hrang hlen tute, Department hotute, tlawmngai pawl hrang hrang te, kohhran hruaitute, zirlaite leh media lama ka thawhpuite chungah min tawiawmna leh thawhpuinaah lawm thu ka sawi a, he ni ropui tak hmang tura lo kalkhawm zawng zawng te chungah lawmthu ka sawi bawk a ni.

A tawp berah chuan kan ram Danpui huam zauzia leh hausakzia hriaa ngai hlu lehzual turin khua leh tui zawng zawngte ka sawm a. Kan Danpuiin min hrilh angin India ram ropui taka hnam hrang hrang te inpumkhatna leh inunauna kan vawn nun zel a pawimawh tih i hre thar leh theuh ang u.

title: REPUBLIC DAY, 2025 LAWMNA MUALVAWM FIELD, KHAWZAWL-A DEPUTY COMMISSIONER PU K.VANLALTHIANA THUSAWI (26TH JANUARY, 2025)
content:
Pi leh Pu, Nu leh Pa, Sawrkara ka thawhpuite leh thian duhtakte u,

Kumin Republic Day vawi 77-naah hian Khawzawl District mipui zawng zawng te chibai ka buk vek a che u; he ni ropui tak kan thleng leh thei hi lawmawm ka ti takzet a, hlim tak leh lawm taka hmang theuh turin duhsakna ka hlan a che u.

January ni 26, 1950 khan kan ram hi mipui rorelna ram, intluktlanna leh zalenna ram, mi tinin dikna chanvo kan neih theihna ramah kan hruaitu ten an lo siam tawh a, India ram chu ram ropui leh zahawm tak, khawvel puma ram pawimawh tak leh thil ti thei tak a lo ni ta a, ram hruaitute leh mipui thawh rimna zarah hriselna kawngah te, zirnaah te, eizawnnaah te leh thil dang tam takah India ram pumpui hian hma a sawn a ni.

Khawzawl District pawh kum 2019 a din a nih atang khan hma kan sawn chak em em a. Hand Holding Policy, Bana Kaih Policy kan tih, kan Sawrkar flagship programme hi kan rama kut hnathawktute tihhmasawnna tura ruahmanna a ni a. Department hrang hrang - Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Department te, Horticulture Department te, Rural Development Department te, Irrigation and Water Resources Department te, Sericulture Department te, Fisheries Department leh KVK hnuaiah te kut hnathawktute tihhmasawnna turin kan District chhungah Scheme hrang hrang hnuaiah nasa taka hmalak a ni a. Kut hnathawktute hriatna leh thiamna belhchhah turin training hrang hrang pek an niin thlai chi leh thlai tiak, chi hrang hrang kut hnathawktute hnenah sem a ni a, chhungkaw tamtak hnenah tanpuina pek a ni. Kut hnathawktute hna thawhna hmunhma tichangtlunga tihmasawn turin kawng hrang hranga hma lak a ni bawk.

Dan leh thupek kenkawh kawnga Police hmalakna hi a chhuanawm takzet a. Kan District chhung a ralmuangin a muanawm a, buaina liantham sawi tur a awm lo. Krismas leh kumthar vuakveta halpuah leh halmawi hal lo tura Sawrkar thupek tha taka kenkawh a nih avangin Police, Magistrate duty leh NGO hrang hrangte chungah lawmthu ka sawi takmeuh a ni.

Hmasawnna ruhrel lian tham din kawngah pawh kan District chhunga chak taka hmalak a ni hi lawmthu ka sawi takmeuh a ni. Public Works Department-in hmun hrang hrangah kawngpui sial leh thawmthat hna chak takin an kalpui a. Cheng vaibelchhe sawm man Circuit House sak mek a ni a, Revenue Quarters sak mek a niin District Research Office tihchangtlun hna pawh thawh mek a ni.

Khawzawl District-in hma a sawn zel theihnan ruahmanna chak taka kalpui a ni a. District Transport Office leh DC Office ah Revenue Branch hawn fel a ni tawh a. Treasury Office leh Quarters cheng vaibelchhe 3 man te, Sialhawk Multipurpose Hall cheng vaibelchhe hnih man te, Demdum to Tuichang Pump House cheng vaibelchhe 3 man te hna tan thuai theih beisei a ni a, Cheng vaibelchhe 15 man tur Mini Secretariat Complex ruahmanna pawh chak taka kalpui a ni. Deputy Commissioner of State Tax leh Assistant Commissioner, Excise & Narcotics kan nei thar bawk a, hei hi thil chhinchhiah tlak leh lawmawm tak a ni.

Hriselna kawnga hma kan sawn theihnan nasa taka hmalak a ni a. Khum 50 awmtheihna tur District Hospital leh Quarters sak hna pawh chak taka kalpui a ni a, Chief Medical Officer kan nei tawh a, Respiratory Medicine leh Paediatricts Doctor kan nei tawh bawk. Nikum September ni 19 khan Multi Speciality Clinic buatsaih a ni a, Doctor thiam tak tak tak te lo kalin mi 5640 an inentir a, hei hi thil lawmawm leh chhinchhiah tlak tak a ni.

Tui thianghlim, hnianghnar taka mi tinin kan dawn theihnan PHE Department in theihtawp an chhuah a. Thingtlang in 4910 ah functional tap water connection pek an ni tawh a, Hmuncheng Solar Pumping Scheme pawh hawn thuai theih beisei a ni. Tualpui Water Supply Scheme pawh chak taka bawhzui a ni bawk.

Kawlphetha hnianghnara kan dawn theihnan P&E Department in nasa takin hna an thawk a. Tualpui Power Supply pekna leh Kawlkulh khaw chhunga Power Supply pek chhuahna cheithat leh tihchangtlun hna pawh thawh zawh a ni tawh bawk.

Rural Development Department hnuaiah thingtlang mite hmasawnna leh intodelhna turin Scheme hrang hrang hnuaiah theihtawpa hmalak a ni a. Chawngtlaia Community Weaving Centre pawh hawn fel a ni tawh bawk.

Kan District chhunga khualzin kan hip theih nan kawng hrang hrangin hma lak a ni a. Nikum September ni 16 khan kan Chief Minister zahawm tak hoin Tualpuiah Lozawhpui ropui taka hman a ni a. Kawng hrang hranga hmalakna hian khualzinte a hip mai bakah kut hnathawktute tan beiseina leh tumruhna, taimakna thar a siam ngei ka beisei tlat a ni.

Ruihhlo do hna hautak zet mai pawh hi nasa taka kalpui zel a ni a. Kum kalta chhung khan kan Police Department ten Heroin gram 747, cheng nuai 84.80 man leh Meth kg 11.612, cheng nuai 150.96 man hu an man a. Excise & Narcotics Department ten Heroin gram 539 leh Ganza gram 880 an man bawk. Ruihhlo do kawngah hian Kohhran, NGO leh tlawmngai pawl hrang hrangte nasa lehzuala kan tanho a ngai takmeuh a ni.

Kan District chhunga hmasawnna kal mek te hi kan sawi vek seng awm love. Department hrang hrangte thawhrimna leh inpekna fakawmin chhuanawm ka ti takmeuh a, kan mipuite tan nasa lehzuala tan la turin ka sawm takmeuh che u a ni.

Vawiin Repuublic Day lawmna atana rim taka thawktu zawng zawng te, Parade Contingent te, Band Party te, Parade Commander te, Announcer te, zirlai naupang leh mipui lo kalkhawm zawng zawng chungah te ka thinlung takin lawmthu ka sawi takmeuh a ni.

Thian duhtakte u, Kan ram Danpuiin zalenna leh intluktlanna min pek hi vawng himin inhmangaih tawna, inlungruala, indawmkang tawnin, hawh u, kan ram hi ram nuam leh changkangah i siam ang u.

KA LAWM E

JAI HIND

title: HNAHTHIAL DISTRICT-AH REPUBLIC DAY VAWI 77-NA ROPUI TAKA LAWM A NI
content:
4152/2025-2026

Dated Hnahthial, the 26th January, 2026:India Danpui duan champha vawi 77-na pualin HDSC/HDFA Turf Ground-ah Hnahthial District Bawrhsap, Pi K.Vanlalruati chuan hnam puanzar pawt pharhin Republic Day ropui taka lawm a ni a. Khuallian chuan hnam puanzar a pawh pharh hnu hian parade contingent sawm(10) chibai bukna chu chhang letin thusawina hun a hmang nghal a ni.

Bawrhsap chuan India ram, mipuite rorelna ram ni tura Danpui duan a nih champha kan thleng leh ta chu lawmawm a tih thu sawiin hnam hrang hrang, ze hrang hrang lungrual taka kan awm khawm theih chhan chu he Danpui hi a nih thu a sawi a. Ram Danpui duantu, hruaitu hmasate chu zahna chibai bukin India ram hmasawn ruala Hnahthial District pawn hma a sawn ve tawhna te chu a tarlang a. Kum 2025 chhung pawn Office hrang hrang - District Transport Office, District Veterinary Hospital leh Land Revenue Office bakah Panchayat Resource Centre te chu hawn a nih thu tarlangin National Informatics Centre, (NIC) Office pawh an in hawn tan ve mek thu a tarlang a, District chhunga Office hrang hrang hmalaknate chu a tarlang bawk.

Bawrhsap chuan heng hmasawnna zawng zawng thlen theih chhan chu mipuite leh sawrkar thawhhona a nih thu sawiin inlungrualna pawimawhzia tarlangtu a nih thu a sawi a. Sawrkar, NGO leh mipuite an tan rual chuan Hnahthial District chu District hmasawn ber an ni thei a ni tiin zirlai kalkhawmte chu District leh ram innghahna tur an nih avangin zirna lamah theihtawp chhuah a, inlungrualna rilru vawng nung zel turin a chah nghal a ni.

Republic Day lawmnaah hian Parade Contingent sawm (10) awmin Ceremonial Parade Commander, Govt. Hnahthial College NCC leh Govt. Southern High School pipe band-te hnenah special prize hlan an ni a. School parade contingent ti tha pathum(3) te hnenah lawmman sem a ni bawk. Lawmman dawngtute chu:

title: Speech of the Deputy Commissioner Serchhip on the occasion of Republic Day, 2026 celebration at Serchhip Sports Complex
content:
Vawiin India Republic Day vawi 77-na ah hian in zavaiin chibai ka buk a che u.

Kum 1950, January ni 26 ah khan India Danpui (Constitution) chu hman tan a ni a. He ni champhaphak a lo thlen  hian India ram dung leh vanga cheng ten, kan Danpui laimu- dikna, zalenna, intluktlanna leh inunauna a tharin i vawng nung zel ang u.

Kan Danpui duangchhuaktu mi ropui kal hmasate leh kan ram zalenna sualtu pasaltha huaisente zahna chibai ka buk a. An inhlan famkimna avangin he ramah hian zalen takin kan cheng thei a ni tih kan hria a; keini pawhin an hniak hnung zuiin, kan ram tan kan theihna leh thiamna te i hlan zel ang u.

Serchhip District hmasawnna turin kawng hrang hrangin sawrkar chuan hma a la a. Serchhip Town Beautification Project duan niin State UD&PA buatsaih inelnaa lawmman kan dawn, cheng nuai 50 in bul kan tan a. Department hrang hrangte leh VC-te nen thawk hoin cheng nuai 153.58 lai sen ral a lo ni ta a. He sum hmang hian Serchhip khawpui chhung hmun hrang hrang cheithat leh cheimawi hna thawh a ni.

State Collaboration Initiative kaltlangin Serchhip District chuan Sawrkar Laipui DARPG-ah cheng nuai 60 senna tur  District Plan and Project Monitoring System project proposal a thehlut a. India ram pumpui atanga proposal lut zingah Serchhip District chu Mizoram atanga thlanchhuah awm chhun a ni a; tunah hian kalpui tan mek a ni.

Mizoramah a hmasa ber ni turin District mipuiten harsatna awlsam taka thuneitute hnena kan thlen theihna tur Vantlang Viltu App siam a ni a. Mi 429 an in register tawh a. Kum kalta chhunga complaint 53 kan dawn zingah 51 chinfel a ni tawh a, 2 hi buaipui mek a ni.

Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyan hnuaiah anti-drug campaign thuang hrang hranga kalpui a ni a.  Tlawmngai pawl te, sports association te, kohhran hote leh school zirlai zingah campaign neih a ni a.  NMBA bultumin February ni 9 atanga February ni 20, 2026 chhung hian Serchhip District pum huap ruihhlo ngaite pual camping neih a ni dawn bawk a. Thiante u,

title: HNAHTHIAL DISTRICT KUM 2026 REPUBLIC DAY LAWMNAA K.VANLALRUATI, DEPUTY COMMISSIONER HNAHTHIAL DISTRICT THU SAWI
content:
Thian duhtak te u,

Vawiin ah hian India Danpui kan hmanna champha, Republic Day kan lo thleng leh ta reng mai. He ni ropui tak chhim tura lo kalkhawm mipui zawng zawngte, in zavaiin chibai ka buk a che u in, duhsakna ka hlan a che u.

Kum 1950, vawiin ni angah khan India ram chu mipuite rorelna ram, mi tupawh in kawng engkima chanvo intluktlang kan neih theihna ram ni turin – India Danpui chu duan chhuah a hman lo ni ta a ni. India ram lungphum pawimawh tak mai chu phum niin, chuta tang chuan India chu khawvela mipuite rorelna ram lian ber pakhatah a lo in din nghet ta a ni. Hnam hrang hrang, ze hrang hrang awm khawmna ni chungin, a chhunga cheng mipuite chu inpumkhat leh inlungrual takin kan cheng ho ta zel a, Khawvel mit hmuhah pawh ram lian leh ropui berte zinga chhiar kan lo ni ta hial a ni. Tun dinhmun kan thlen theihna chhan hi kan Ram hruaitu hmasa ten rilru leh tihtakzeta kan ram Danpui an lo duan chhuah vang hi a ni kan ti lo thei lovang, an finna leh inpekna te a ropuiin an chhuanawm tak zet a ni.

India ram in hma a sawn rual hian Mizoram pawhin zawi zawiin hma kan sawn chho ve zel a, kum 20/30 kal ta a chhungkaw tinte dinhmun leh nunphung han ngaihtuah let hian, hmuh theih khawpa hma kan sawn zia a lang chiang awm e. Tin, Hnahthial District pawhin, 2019 kuma District puitlinga puan kan nih atangin hmasawnna tam tak kan hmuin kan hre thar reng a ni. Hmasawnna hrang hrang kan hmuhte hi sorkar department hrang hrangte leh khawtlang mipuite tanrualna a zara kan neih a ni a, thahnem ngai taka thawk a inpe thin te in chhuanawm em em a ni.

Kumin chhung a kan District in  hmasawnna tam tak a neih te zing ah District Transport Office te, District Veterinary Hospital te leh Land Revenue Office te chu kan Minister zahawm tak tak te’n tun sorkar kum chhung hian an rawn hawng a, tin,  khawtlang inrelbawlna tha zawk neihna kawnga puitu pawimawh tak - District Panchayat Resource Centre pawh hawn a lo ni ta bawk a ni. Online meeting leh online thil kaihhnawih hrang hrang buaipuitu tur National Informatics Centre, (NIC) Office pawhin hna an thawk tan ve mek bawk a ni.

Sawi tak ang khan District hmasawnna turin Office hrang hrangte’n an hma zawn theuhvah theihawp chhuahin hma an la a. Chung an hmalakna zinga langsar zualte chu han tarlang ila.

1. School Education Department leh Samagra Shikshate’n zirna in hma a sawn theihna turin theihtawpin hma an la a, hmasawnna hrang hrang te zingah a langsar zual tlem a zawng lo tarlang ila –

II) Land Revenue Officechu  31stOctober 2025 khan a changtu Minister zahawm takin mipuite mamawhna hriain a rawn hawng a. Tun dinhmunah hian thawktu hi panga (5) awm mekin, he Office hian LSC sawmruk pariat(68) bakah House Pass sawm(10) an tichhuak tawh a, Periodic Patta sawmnga pariat (58) an renew tawh bawk a ni.

III) District Hospitalah January atanga December 2025 chhung khan OPD ah in entir singkhat sangli zanga sawm pariat (14518) an awm a. In Patient Dept. ah damlo zanga sawm leh pasarih (517) awmin, nau piang sawmsarih pathum (73) kan nei a ni.

Digital India hmalakna hnuaiah Hospital zawng zawnga hman tur NextGen e-Hospital chu February 2025 atang khan hman tan ve niin, OPD registration pawh a tam thei ang ber Online a kalpui tawh a ni.

Sawrkar chuan Hnahthial District mipuite mamawhna hria in Endoscopy leh X-Ray khawl thar chu December 2025 khan Hospital a rawn pe bawk a ni.

Mizoram Universal Health care Scheme chu District hmang tangkai berte zinga mi kan ni a, tun 2025-26  kum kal mekah hian damlo zathum sawmkua (390) in an hmang tangkai tawh a. Chu chu damlo in admit zat atanga chhutinza zelah sawmriat (80%) an tling pha a ni.

IV) District Transport Officechu nikum 2025 17thOctober khan a Department changtu Minister zahawm tak chuan hawngin, Hnahthial District chuan kan pualin RTO (Regional transport Office) Code hran - MZ-11 kan lo nei ve ta a. DTO Office hawn tirh atang khan Driving License sawmthum leh pathum(33) tihchhuah tawh niin, lirthei sawmruk leh pali (64) register tawh an ni a. Chhiah leh pawisa chawi ngai hrang hrang  ankhawn atang a tling khawm chu cheng nuai ruk sing kua sangkhat leh zahnih sawmhnih pariat (69,1228) a ni tawh a ni.

V)Taxation Officechuan sawrkarin mipuite hamthatna atan a hman tur chhiah a khawn thin a ni. Sorkar kum kal mek 2025-26 chhung, nikum December thleng khan he Office hmalakna a chhiah chi hrang hrang tling khawm chu cheng vaibelchhe hnih, nuai sawmli pathum, sing ruk zali leh sawmruk panga (Rs. 2,43,60,465/-) a ni.

VI)Public Works Departmentchuan mipuite’n kawng awlsam leh tha zawk kan neih nan theihtawp an chhuah a. Tunah hian hna hrang hrang thawh mek niin, thawh tura ruahman tam tak a awm mek bawk a. Chung zinga a langsar zualte chu han tarlang ila –

VII)District Agriculture Officechuan kum 2025-26 chhung khan RKVY (Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana) hnuaiah tui dahkhawlnapakua (9) siam in, pakhat (1) chhia an siamtha (repair) bawk a, Cheng nuai hnih, singkhat leh sang hnih (Rs 2,12,000/-) seng in  Solar pump pahnih (2) bakah cheng nuai hnih sing hnih sang ruk za kua (Rs. 2,26,900) sengin UPVC leh HDPE Coil Pipe te chu Saphak Project tan siam a ni. Rainfed Area Development (RAD) hnuaiah loneitu za sawmthum pahnih (132) te chu cheng singthum (Rs. 30,000) theuhva tanpuina pek an ni bawk.

VIII) PHE Departmentchuan mipuite’n tui thianghlim hnianghnar taka kan hmuh theih nan hma la in AMRUT 2.0 hnuaiah Augmentation of Greater Hnahthial chu thawh chhunzawm zel a ni a. Hna thawh tur zawng zawng za a sawmriat leh pahnih (82%) chu zawh fel tawh niin, he scheme kaltlang hian ITC Tlangah leh Rallang Tlangah tui dahkhawlna litre nuai nga (5 lakh litres) dawng thei tur pakhat ve ve dah a ni bawk. Tun dinhmunah hian Hnahthial khaw chhungah tui connection nei hi chhungkua sangkhat zakua sawmnga leh pasarih (1957) kan nei mek a. Tui hi 70 LPCD (litre per capita per day) a pek chhuah thin niin, Mizoram District Headquarters-ah chuan tui sem thatna ber kan ni.

IX)KVKchuan loneitute tan an mamawh tur thlai tiak te semin training te an pe thin a. Tun sorkar kum chhung hian Thlai leh thei tiak chi hrang hrang an sem chhuak thin a, loneitu pathum (3) hnenah artui sawmnga (50) awp keu theihna- Mini Hatchery an pe chhuak bawk a ni.

NICRA (National Innovations in Climate Resilient Agriculture)  project hnuaiah kuthnathawktute tan Custom Hiring Centre (CHC) thar South Vanlaiphai ah leh Tuipui South ah hawn a ni a, Hnahthial district ah CHC pathum (3) hawn a lo ni tawh bawka, tin, Weather Station thar South Vanlaiphai ah bun a ni bawk.

ARYA (Attracting and Retaining Youth in Agriculture) project hnuaiah Hnahthial District chhung khaw hrang hrang a thalai te’n eizawnna an hmuh ve theih nan khuai khawi (bee keeping) te, pa khawi (mushroom cultivation) te, leitha siam (vermi composting) te, vawk leh ar vulh ah te hmalak pui an ni.

X)District Civil Supply Officechuan mipui mimir, mi harsa leh chanhai zawk te’n ei leh bar tur an neih theih nan Ration Card chi hrang hrang  kal tlangin Buhfai a pe chhuak thin a. Ration Card then thianghlim hna thawh mek a ni bawk. Ration Buhfai, a tling ngei a mipuite’n an lak theih nan Retailer tinah buhfai bukna tur khawl Digital Weighing Scale hman tir vek anni tawh bawk a ni.

XI)ICDS(Integrated Child Development Services Scheme)

chuan naupangte hrisel leh tha taka an than len theih nan hma la in ei leh in bakah zirna lamah an pui thin a. Naupang an rih zawng leh san zawng inmil lo, dinhmun hlauhawm a awm te chu Operation SAM (severe acute malnutrition)hnuaiah mi pakhat tan Rs. 15,000 pek thin a ni. PMMVY (Pradhan Mantri Matri Vandana Yojana) scheme hi Mizoram leh India ram hmun hrang hranga hmeichhia, naupai leh nau pawmten hriselna leh chawtha an hmuh theih nan leh inhlawhfa thei lova an awm laia an sum hloh tlem azawng phuhrukna tura sorkar laipui scheme a ni a, he scheme hnuaiah Hnahthial district hian tun financial year chhunga kan target chu kan khum tawh a, Mizoram a district te zingah a titha ber kan ni mek a ni.

XII)District Urban Development Officechuan Hnahthial khawpui bawlhhlawh paihna tur Solid Waste Management Centre (SWMC) chu Rotlang East ramah a sak hna an kalpui tan mek a. Tin, PMAY (U) 2.0 atan hmalakna kalpui mek a ni bawk a, beneficiaries sawmhnih leh pariat (28) thlan chhuah tawh an ni. Swachh Bharat mission (SBM) hnuaiah Community Public Toilet (CTPT) Unit sawm pakhat (11) sak tawh niin Aspirational Public Toilet thar pakhat (1) sak zawh tawh a ni bawk. Sewage Treatment Plant (STP) sakna tur  pawh Dihmun Zawl, Thingsai Road, Hnahthial South-I VC area ah a hmun tur ruahman fel tawh a ni.

XIII)Block Development Officehnuaiah hian hmasawnna hna hrang hrang thawh thin niin, kum 2025-26 chhung hian MGNREGS hnuaiah hna chi hrang hrang zakua leh sawmhnih (920), cheng nuai sangkhat zaruk sawmkua panga (Rs. 16,95,65,584) sengin thawh a ni a. January 2026 thleng hian khaw sawmthum leh pahnih (32) ah Job Card sang sarih za leh sawmnga (7150) pekchhuah tawh niin nikhat inhlawh man hi cheng zahnih sawmriat leh pakhat (Rs 281) a ni. MzSRLM hnuaiah SHG (self help group) zaruk sawmriat leh pahnih (682) awmin,  In (household)  sangnga zahnih sawmli leh pasarih (5247) tuam mek an ni bawk.

XIV)DRDOhian MGNREGS te, PMKSY 2.0 te  leh PMAY–G te kaltlangin hmasawnna hna a thawk a. MGNREGS hnuaiah hian job card nung lai sangruk zariat sawmriat (6880) a awm mek a, Sorkar kum 2025-26 chhung hian mipui, job card neite chu  ni sawmriat pakua (89 days) inhlawhna tur siamsak an ni. PMKSY 2.0 hian S.Chawngtui, Tarpho leh Khawhri khuate chu huamin, hnathawhna turin cheng nuai zaruk sawmsarih leh pahnih (Rs. 672 Lakhs) dah a ni a, Multipurpose building chu Tarpho ah sak a ni bawk. PMAY-G hnuaiah hamthatna dawngtu mi zathum sawmnga leh pakhat (351) awmin, final instalment hi mi zahnih sawmruk panga (265) ten an hmu tawh a ni.

XV)P&E Departmentchuan Hnahthial District mipuite’n power supply tha taka kan hmuh theih nan nasa takin hna an thawk thin a ni. Pangzawla Distribution Transfomer chu 100 kVA atangin 250 kVA ah tihsan niin Peniel vengah 100 kVA  Transformer dah turin hma lak mek a ni bawk. RDS (Revamp Distribution Sector) Scheme hnuai ah Hnahthial khaw chhung veng hrang hrang bakah Hnahthial atang a Power pek chhuah ho khua ah te 11kV line extension, LT line extension leh Transformer dah belh turin hma lak mek a ni a, Electric connection la nei lo te connection thar pek turin ruahmanna a kal mek reng bawk a ni.

XVI)District Horticulture Officechuan loneitute tanMission for Integrated Development of Horticulturehnuaiah Hnahthial, Pangzawl, Tarpho leh Denlung khua atang te in thingfanghma ching tur loneitu mi 20 thlang chhuakin, a chi an pe a ni. XX)Fisheries Departmenthian tun kum 2025–2026 chhung hian Freshwater fisheries development programme hnuaiah sangha dil siamna tur tanpuina sum chu chhungkua 20 te hnenah pek niin,  Dil thar siamna tur pawh chhungkua 25 te hnenah pek a ni.

India ramin zalenna kan neih tirha a kehchhiat mai ringtu ram tam tak chu hmasawnna lamah kan khum ta der mai. Kan hruaitu hmasa ten dikna leh rinawmna nen, inlungrualna pawimawhzia hre chunga kan ram lung an lo phum vang kan ti lo thei lovang. Chutiang bawkin mipuite pawhin, he District tan tiin rilru thar pu ila. District naupang berte zinga mi ni mah ila, kan inlungruala, thawh ho kan thiam phawt chuan, District hmasawn ber kan ni thei a ni.

Helai a zirlai lokal khawm te pawh kan ram hmalam hun leh hmathlir in ni a, ram tana mi hmantlak ni turin zirna leh nungchang ṭhatah theihtawp chhuah turin ka chah nghal bawk che u a ni.

Ka lawm e. Jai Hind.

Tun hnaiah Government of India chuan thu rawn chhuah thar lehin, he integration hna hi a rang thei ang bera zo turin thu a pêk mai bakah, State Sawrkar hmalakna leh thlen chinte pawh report thehlut turin State Sawrkar zawng zawngte a hriattir avangin, Mizoram-ah pawh internet awm miah lohna khua te pawh a lo awm tâk mang loh avangin January, 2026 atang chuan integration hi kalpui ve a ni.

title: SPEECH OF SMT. NAVNEET MANN, IAS DEPUTY COMMISSIONER, LUNGLEI DISTRICT ON THE OCCASION OF THE 77TH REPUBLIC DAY CELEBRATION AT C. ṬHUAMLUAIA MUAL, LUNGLEI (26th January 2026)
content:
ṬHIAN DUH TAKTE,

Vawiina lo pung khawmte leh Lunglei District mipui zawng zawngte,Republic Day vawi 77-na chibaika buk che u a.Kum thar 2026 duhsaknasang ber ka hlan bawk a che u.

Today, as we celebrate the77th Republic Day of India, we reaffirm our collective faith in the ideals ofjustice, liberty, equality and fraternityenshrined in our Constitution. This solemn occasion reminds us that governance is not merely about administration, but aboutservice, inclusion and dignityfor every citizen.

Mizoramis blessed with a rich cultural heritage that values community living, mutual respect and collective responsibility. These values resonate deeply with the spirit of our Constitution. From grassroots democracy to community participation, the people of Lunglei continue to uphold unity in diversity and inclusive growth.

As we enter2026, evolving regional and global developments highlight the crucial role of our security forces. I place on record our deep appreciation for the92 Battalion Border Security Force, 152 Bn BSFand20 Assam Rifles, whose personnel stand as sentinels of our nation’s security. Through unwavering border vigilance, successful operations against arms, narcotics and contraband, and sustained civic action programmes, they have contributed immensely topeace, stability and national integrationin Lunglei District.

At the district level, theLunglei District Police, 2ndBn Mizoram Armed Police, and Excise & Narcotics Departmenthave worked relentlessly to maintain law and order and combat social evils. I also acknowledge the vital role ofchurches, NGOs, civil society and the public—who extended humanitarian support to refugees, while cooperating with the administration in addressing challenges associated with such influxes and social evils, thereby upholding peace, compassion and the rule of law.

District Progress Overview

The year2025–2026has been a landmark year for Lunglei District—defined byinnovation, inclusiveness, people-centric governance and convergence, in alignment with theTransformed Mizoram Vision 2047andViksit Bharat 2047.

Allow me to highlight the key achievements across sectors.

Infrastructure & District Development

Project BLOOM strengthened maternal and child health through:

Healthy Lunglei Initiative focused onearly screening and prevention of non-communicable diseases, changing community health behaviour andintroduction of Health ATMs—first of its kind in Mizoram.

Conclusion

The achievements of Lunglei District during 2025–2026 are the result ofcollective effort, community participation and dedicated public service. They reaffirm our belief that innovation at the grassroots can transform lives.

I express my heartfelt gratitude to all NGOs, churches, the media, and the general public for their unwavering cooperation. I also compliment the parade contingents, students and everyone gathered here today.

As we celebrate this77th Republic Day, let us renew our commitment to building ahealthy, inclusive, educated and empowered Lunglei, contributing meaningfully toViksit Mizoram and Viksit Bharat by 2047.

He ni ropui takah hian, India ram inpumkhatna leh ropuina vawng nung a, Lunglei District hmasawnna tur leh mipuite tana thawk zel turin i inhlan thar leh ṭheuh ang u.

title: C. ṬHUAMLUAIA MUAL, LUNGLEIA REPUBLIC DAY VAWI 77-NA LAWMNAA KHUALLIAN, PI NAVNEET MANN, IAS, LUNGLEI DISTRICT BAWRHSAP THU SAWI (26th January 2026)
content:
ṬHIAN DUH TAKTE,

Vawiina lo pung khawmte leh Lunglei District mipui zawng zawngte, Republic Day vawi 77-na chibai ka buk che u a. Kum thar 2026 duhsakna sang ber ka hlan bawk a che u.

Vawiin, India ram mahnia ro inrel tura Danpui hman ṭan a nih ni, Republic Day vawi 77-na kan lawm mek lai hian dikna, zalenna, intluk tlanna leh inunauna min siamtu kan ram Danpui chunga kan rinna leh beiseina chu tihnghehin a awm a. He hun hian ram inrelbawlna chu dan leh hrai hmanga inenkawlna chauh ni lovin, khua leh tui zawng zawng huap zo, khua leh tuite zahawmna vawn nunna leh rawngbawlsakna a ni tih min hriat thartir a ni.

Mizoram hian hnam ziarang leh nunphung ṭha tak, khawtlang ngaih pawimawhna te, inzah tawnna leh neitu rilru put tlatna te kan nei a. Hei hi kan ram Danpui nen pawh a inhne rem hle a. Khawtlang rorelna bulṭhut aṭanga vantlang nun hona chenin, Lunglei District mipuite hian danglamna kara inpumkhatna leh mi tin huap zo hmasawnna kan kengkawh tha hle a ni.

Kum 2026 kan chuan kai mek laiin, khawvel pum leh kan ṭhenawm ram chhunga boruak inlum let vel hian ram veng himtu sipaite pawimawhna a tar lang chiang hle a. Kan ram himna tura Lunglei District chhunga ramri veng himtu sipai awmte, 92 Battalion Border Security Force, 152 Bn BSF leh 20 Assam Rifles te hi kan ngaihluin, kan chhuang hle a. Ramri veng him tura an thawh rimna te, ralthuam, ruihhlo leh dan phal loh thil tawlh ruk veng tura an chet lakna leh vantlang hmasawnna tura an hna thawh zawng zawngte hian Lunglei District chhungah remna, ralmuanna leh ram inpumkhatna boruak ṭha tak a siam a ni.

Dan leh thupek kenkawhna kawngah te, khawtlanga sualna leh pawi khawihna hrang hrang do kawngah leh District chhung ralmuanna kawngah te Lunglei District Police, 2ndBn Mizoram Armed Police leh Excise & Narcotics Department te an thawk rimin, an thawh hlawk hle a. Raltlante lo dawnsawn leh chhawmdawl kawngah te, khawtlanga sualna hrang hrang do kawngah leh dan zawm kawngah te kohhran, tlawmngai pawl, khawtlang leh mipuite’n sawrkar kan thawhpui ṭhain, kan zavaia ṭan hona hi a chhuanawm tak zet a ni.

District Hmasawnna

Kum 2025–2026 hi Transformed Mizoram Vision 2047 leh Viksit Bharat 2047 hmathlir nen inhne rema sawrkar hma lakna leh thawh hona kawngah Lunglei District tan kum chhinchhiah tlak tak a ni a. Kawng hrang hranga hmasawnna leh hlawhtlinna te han tar lang i la.

Tlipna

Kum 2025–26 chhunga Lunglei District hmasawnna leh hlawhtlinna hi department hrang hrang, pawl, kohhran leh mipuite thawh hona rah a ni a. A bulṭhut aṭanga awmze neia hma lakna hian a ṭha zawngin danglamna nasa tak a thlen thei tih nem nghettu a ni.

NGO, kohhran, media leh mipuite min thawhpuinaah thinlung takin lawm thu ka sawi a. Parade contingent-te, zirlaite leh vawiina mipui lo pung khawm zawng zawng chungah lawm thu ka sawi bawk e.

He Republic Day vawi 77-na kan lawm lai hian, Lunglei hrisel, changkang, hmasawn leh mi tin lenna din turin inhlan thar leh i la, kum 2047 atana Viksit Mizoram leh Viksit Bharat hmathlir a hlawhtlin theih nan theih tawp i chhuah zel ang u.

He ni ropui takah hian, India ram inpumkhatna leh ropuina vawng nung a, Lunglei District hmasawnna tur leh mipuite tana thawk zel turin i inhlan thar leh ṭheuh ang u.
